Posts.Content: Jun 11, 2009 08:43PM meinnj wrote: my mother and sister picked up some cute, light half camis that  I can pull up from my feet- they give bearable compression that you can even sleep in and look really cute with any v-neck shirt, or dress, or even sweatshirt.  You don't need big and baggy- light sports bras are everywhere. Bilateral mast with full left LND 5/2009.

What should I bring? DCIS with microinvasion St 2 11/20 nodes pos
